app.create_button_command_description: Create a button for users to submit pictures
app.create_submission_button_description:
Click the button to submit a new picture.
If that doesn't work, try `/submit`
app.token_rejected: Login failed! Is your token correct?

embed.embed_footer: Click on the image to enlarge it!

prompt.too_slow: You took too long to respond. Please try again.

interaction.already_pending_submission: You already have a pending submission! Please either finish or cancel it before submitting another one.
interaction.user_greeting:
Heya! You can submit your image here.
If you change your mind at any point, just send "stop"!
----
interaction.dms_deactivated: It seems like you deactivated your DMs. Please activate them to use this bot.
interaction.no_post_permission: Error: No permissions to send message!
interaction.submission_successful: Your submission has been successfully sent!
